products.title: Golden Girls Magnet Set (Set of 4)
products.description: Stay golden! This cute Golden Girls magnet set features all four ladies with their classic quotes. A fun, nostalgic addition to any fridge or workspace—and the perfect gift for fans of the show.
products.descriptionHtml: Stay golden! This cute Golden Girls magnet set features all four ladies with their classic quotes. A fun, nostalgic addition to any fridge or workspace—and the perfect gift for fans of the show.

products.title: The Signature Magnet Frame- Frame Only
products.description: Introducing the Magnet Moments Co. Magnet Frame Capture life's biggest milestones in a miniature gallery. Our signature magnet frame is designed to turn your favorite digital memories into a tangib...
products.descriptionHtml:
Introducing the Magnet Moments Co. Magnet Frame

Capture life's biggest milestones in a miniature gallery. Our signature magnet frame is designed to turn your favorite digital memories into a tangible, high-quality display that fits perfectly into your home.

Whether you’re celebrating a new arrival, a first Christmas, or just the everyday joy of watching your family grow, the Magnet Moments Co. frame offers a modern, interactive way to showcase what matters most.

What’s Included:

  • One Premium Magnetic Frame: Choose from our classic Square or Panoramic layouts in timeless white or sleek black. Actual photo magnets NOT included!

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Swap & Style: The magnetic backing allows you to easily rearrange your photos or swap them out as your family hits new milestones.

  • Perfectly Giftable: A thoughtful, personalized gift for grandparents, new parents, or as a beautiful addition to a nursery or office.

  • Seamless Design: The frame provides a clean, matted look that makes your 2x2 magnets pop.

products.title: 2x2 Custom Photo Magnets
products.description: Don’t let your favorite memories stay stuck on your phone. Bring your camera roll to life with our Custom Photo Magnets. Whether it’s a candid shot of the kids, a wedding portrait, or a goofy pictu...
products.descriptionHtml:
Don’t let your favorite memories stay stuck on your phone. Bring your camera roll to life with our Custom Photo Magnets. Whether it’s a candid shot of the kids, a wedding portrait, or a goofy picture of your pet, these 2x2" magnets turn your fridge into a gallery of the moments that matter most.

Each magnet is printed with high-definition clarity and built to last, making them the perfect addition to your kitchen, office locker, or magnetic board.

Make your moments stick today!

featuredImage.altText: Personalized photo magnets scattered on a wooden table, perfect for custom gifts and keepsakes.

nodes.altText: Personalized photo magnets scattered on a wooden table, perfect for custom gifts and keepsakes.
Set of six custom photo magnets arranged on a stainless steel refrigerator featuring wedding, family, and pet portraits.
Four square 2x2 custom photo magnets displayed on a black background showing high-quality glossy print finish.
Five square 2x2 custom photo magnets displayed on a black background showing high-quality glossy print finish.

products.title: 2x3 Custom Photo Magnets
products.description: Moments that Stick, Now in Widescreen! Sometimes a square just isn't enough. Our new 2" x 3" Rectangle Magnets offer a larger canvas for your favorite photos, meaning less cropping and more context...
products.descriptionHtml:
Moments that Stick, Now in Widescreen! Sometimes a square just isn't enough. Our new 2" x 3" Rectangle Magnets offer a larger canvas for your favorite photos, meaning less cropping and more context. Whether it’s a breathtaking sunset from your vacation, a full-length wedding shot, or a family portrait, this size preserves the details that matter most.

Hand-crafted with the same high-quality materials you love, these magnets are designed to turn your fridge, filing cabinet, or locker into a curated gallery of your life.

Why You’ll Love the 2x3 Size:

Versatile Orientation: Works perfectly for both horizontal (landscape) and vertical (portrait) photos.

No Compromise Cropping: Great for group shots where you don't want to cut anyone out of the frame!

Strong Grip: Durable magnetic backing ensures your photos stay put.

How it Works:

1. Select your set size from the menu above.

2. Upload your photos

3. Sit back and relax: We will professionally crop, print, and press your magnets and ship them straight to your door.

The Details:

Dimensions: 2 inches x 3 inches.

Finish: Glossy protective coating.

Origin: Handmade in Austin, TX by Magnet Moments Co.

products.title: Chicago Football “Good, Better, Best” Magnet Set (Set of 6)
products.description: Bring the spirit of Soldier Field right to your kitchen! Whether you are celebrating the 1985 glory days or surviving another season of "cardiac arrest" football, this set is the perfect way to sho...
products.descriptionHtml:
Bring the spirit of Soldier Field right to your kitchen! Whether you are celebrating the 1985 glory days or surviving another season of "cardiac arrest" football, this set is the perfect way to show your Chi-Town pride.

This 6-piece collection captures the true essence of being a Chicago fan—the history, the hustle, and the humor. Featuring iconic "Bear Down" slogans, vintage helmet artwork, and the classic motivational quote to keep your spirits high, these magnets are a touchdown for any man cave, office, or fridge.

The "Monsters of the Midway" Collection Includes:

• The Classic Roar: Iconic Bear head logo.

• The Reality Check: "Rebuilding Since 1985" (Funny because it’s true!).

• The Fan Life: "Good. Better. Best. Cardiac Arrest" – for the games that keep you on the edge of your seat.

• The History: Vintage-style "Chicago Football 1920" with helmet graphic.

• The Motivation: Two variations of the legendary "Good, Better, Best" quote.

Product Details:

• Quantity: Set of 6 Magnets

• Size: 2" x 2" (Square)

• Material: High-quality durable finish with a strong magnetic backing.

• Use: Perfect for holding up photos, game schedules, or tickets on any magnetic surface.

Why You’ll Love Them:

At Magnet Moments Co., we believe in "Moments that Stick!" These aren't just magnets; they are a badge of honor for the loyal fan who sticks by their team through the good, the bad, and the rebuilding years. Grab a set for yourself or gift one to the die-hard fan in your life!

products.title: Retro Wildflower Magnet Set (Set of 8)
products.description: Bring a touch of eternal spring to your kitchen! This Retro Wildflower Magnet Set features a curated collection of groovy blooms and botanical patterns in warm, nostalgic tones. From terracotta ora...
products.descriptionHtml:
Bring a touch of eternal spring to your kitchen! This Retro Wildflower Magnet Set features a curated collection of groovy blooms and botanical patterns in warm, nostalgic tones.

From terracotta oranges to dusty pinks and calming blues, these magnets aren't just for holding up grocery lists—they are miniature pieces of art. Whether you are decorating your fridge, office locker, or magnetic whiteboard, these blooms add a pop of color that never fades.

featuredImage.altText: Set of 8 square fridge magnets with retro floral and wildflower patterns in pink, orange, and blue on a stainless steel refrigerator.

nodes.altText: Set of 8 square fridge magnets with retro floral and wildflower patterns in pink, orange, and blue on a stainless steel refrigerator.

products.title: "The Office" Collection- (Set of 9)
products.description: "Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica." Transform your refrigerator into the breakroom at Dunder Mifflin. This curated set of nine high-quality magnets captures the most iconic, hilarious, and quotab...
products.descriptionHtml:
"Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica."

Transform your refrigerator into the breakroom at Dunder Mifflin. This curated set of nine high-quality magnets captures the most iconic, hilarious, and quotable moments from The Office (US).

Whether you are a superstitious (or just a little stitious) fan of Michael Scott’s management style, or you appreciate the simpler things in life like Schrute Farms agritourism, this set is the perfect addition to your home or cubicle.

They are strong enough to hold up your important memos from corporate, but funny enough to make you smile every time you go for a snack.

The Perfect Gift for the Superfan

These make an excellent gift for birthdays, holidays, or just because you want to tell someone they are the "World's Best Boss."

seo.description: "Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica." Transform your refrigerator into the breakroom at Dunder Mifflin. Whether you are a superstitious (or just a little stitious) fan of Michael Scott’s management style, or you appreciate the simpler things in life like Schrute Farms agritourism, this set is the perfect addition to your home or cubicle. They are strong enough to hold up your important memos from corporate, but funny enough to make you smile every time you go for a snack. The Perfect Gift for the Superfan These make an excellent gift for birthdays, holidays, or just because you want to tell someone they are the "World's Best Boss." What’s Included in the 9-Piece Set: • Schrute Farms Logo • Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica. Text • Dundie Award Winner • "I feel God in this Chili’s tonight" Pam quote • Dwight "Ignorant Slut" CPR Training • Dwight’s CPR Dummy Face Mask • Prison Mike ("Da Belle of da Ball") • Wayne Gretzky / Michael Scott Inspirational Quote • World’s Best Boss Mug Product Details: • Set includes 9 individual square magnets. • Dimensions: Each magnet measures approximately 2x2 inches. • Glossy, durable finish. • Strong magnetic backing

products.title: The Eras Stamp Collection (Set of 12)
products.description: Capture the magic of every era with this exclusive collection of postage-stamp style magnets. Whether you are in your Reputation era or feeling the Folklore vibes, these magnets are the perfect way...
products.descriptionHtml:
Capture the magic of every era with this exclusive collection of postage-stamp style magnets. Whether you are in your Reputation era or feeling the Folklore vibes, these magnets are the perfect way to display your fandom on your fridge, locker, or whiteboard.

Each magnet features a hand-drawn, minimalist icon representing a specific chapter of the journey—from the cowboy boots and guitars of the beginning to the typewriter of the Tortured Poets Department.

Why You’ll Love Them:

• The Full Set: Includes designs representing all the iconic albums, including the latest TTPD and Life of a Showgirl motifs.

• Unique Design: The postage stamp border adds a vintage, collectible aesthetic that stands out from standard photo magnets.

• Strong Grip: Perfect for holding up your concert tickets, Polaroids, or grocery lists.

featuredImage.altText: Set of 12 postage stamp magnets with Taylor Swift inspired designs.

nodes.altText: Set of 12 postage stamp magnets with Taylor Swift inspired designs.
Set of 12 postage stamp magnets with Taylor Swift inspired designs on a wooden surface
